summary: Stamina reduction for walking, running, swimming, and sneaking for the RPr seeking somewhat realistic conditions.
descriptionHtml:
There was a topic on the BSG Forums where someone was looking for a "plain and simple" running drains stamina mod.

This mod has no scripts. The effects are applied via vanilla spell effects.
As this is the initial release, I expect to make changes as people comment on the mod.

See Change Log for detailed changes.

** Readme **
Name: Activity Uses Stamina
Version: 3.1
Date: 02/28/2014
Category: Gameplay and Effects
Author: Aellis

Description:
============
Movement uses stamina. Different types of movement consume stamina at different rates.
You must rest (be still) to replenish your stamina. None of the vanilla activities that usually
consume Stamina have been changed, i.e. Sprinting, Power Attacks, etc.
If you use 50% of your stamina without resting, the stamina loss double because you're tired.

The rates selected are purely subjective. At 100 stamina, you would use approximately 2/3 thirds
of that 100 to walk from the Whiterun Stables to the Sleeping Ginat in Riverwood.

All of the reduction rates are applied through magic effects, not scripting.
The use rates are set as follows.


From lowest to highest
--------------------------
Walking: 0.20 point per second.
Tired: 0.20

Running: 3.75 pps.
Tired: 3.75 pps.

Sneaking: 0.25 pps
Tired: 0.25

SneakRun: 4.0 pps
Tired: 4.0

Swimming: 4.75 pps
Tired: 4.75

SwimRun: 8.5 pps
Tired: 8.5


You can use the console to turn off or on any of effects.
Change any of the desired global values to 0 to turn off, change it to 1 to turn them back on.
Open the console and type

set X to 0, where x = a global listed below.

_AE_Walking
_AE_WalkingTired
_AE_Running
_AE_RunningTired
_AE_Sneaking
_AE_SneakingTired
_AE_SneakingandRunning
_AE_SneakingandRunningTired
_AE_Swimming
_AE_SwimmingTired
_AE_SwimmingandRunning
_AE_SwimmingandRunningTired



Installation
============
Manual Install
--------------
Extract archive to a temporary folder. Copy ActivityReducesStamina.esp and Readme-ActivityReducesStamina.txt to your
Skyrim Data directory.

Wrye Bash BAIN Install
----------------------
1. Copy the archive to (install folder)Skyrim ModsBash Installers
2. Start Wrye Bash and click on the Installers tab.
3. In the Packages window, right click on the Archive and select install.
4. Click on the Mods tab and check the ActivitiesUseStamina.esp
5. Rebuild your Bashed Patch.


Uninstall
=========
Manual Uninstall
----------------
Delete ActivityReducesStamina.esp and Readme-ActivityReducesStamina.txt from your Skyrim Data directory.

Wrye Bash BAIN Uninstall
------------------------
1. Start Wrye Bash
2. Click on the Installers tab.
3. Right click on the Archive and select Uninstall.
4. Click on the Mods tab and rebuild your Bashed Patch.

Incompatibilities
================================
None as no vanilla effects were harmed in making this mod.
Load order won't make any difference, place it where you will.

Change Log
====================
03/04/2014, v3.2
----------------------
found and corrected error in magic effect.

02/28/2014, v3.1
---------------------
Found and corrected error in Walking Spell.

02/03/2014, v3.0
---------------------
Changed values slightly. Changed application of tired spells to stack with non-tired spells instead of replacing
them.

01/24/2014, v2.0
----------------
Added Globals to allow user selection of activities to monitor, remove individual esps, changed
reduction values.

01/20/2014, V1.0
----------------
Initial Release.

Contact
=======
You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as 'Aellis'

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to nexusnetwork for the free hosting of thousands upon thousands of mods.
(Show your appreciation by becoming a Premium member.)

Tools Used
==========
TES Creation Kit

Licensing/Legal
===============
If I have not been active on any nexus site or the BSG forums and have not responded for
more than 3 months, this mod is open for anyone to modify and release as they see fit.
author: Aellis

files.name: Activity Reduces Stamina v2
files.changelogHtml: Adjusted values. Recombined activities into a single esp. Added global variables to allow users to change activites monitored via console. Removed "Riding" as could not get it to work with just magiceffects.

files.name: Activity Reduces Stamina
files.changelogHtml: Found and corrected error in magic effect causing minute constant damage to health.
